casebody.data:
AVOKI
v.
EAGLE ADJUSTING SERV. INC., et al. 381P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Francisco K. Avoki, for Avoki, Francisco K., et al.

Veronique K. Pongo.

Mica Nguyen Worthy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, for Eagle Adjusting Serv., Inc., et al. Walter M. Dennis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Eagle Adjusting Serv., Inc.

Robert M. Rubin, Attorney at Law, Charlotte.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of November 2017 by Defendants (Eagle Adjusting Services, Inc. and Jsoh Taylor):

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
